original_text: The Sadducees and the Pharisees began to shout louder and louder against each other. There were some teachers of God's Law who were in the group of Pharisees. They stood up in the meeting and they said, ‘We do not believe that this man has done anything wrong. What he says may be true. A spirit or an angel may have spoken to him.’
korean_text: 크게 떠들새 바리새인 편에서 몇 서기관이 일어나 다투어 이르되 우리가 이 사람을 보니 악한 것이 없도다 혹 영이나 혹 천사가 그에게 말하였으면 어찌 하겠느냐 하여

sentences.original_text: The Sadducees and the Pharisees began to shout
louder and louder against each other
There were some teachers of God's Law
who were in the group of Pharisees
They stood up in the meeting
that this man has done anything wrong
What he says may be true
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 말하는 것은 사실일 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: A spirit or an angel may have spoken to him
sentences.korean_translation: 영이나 천사가 그에게 말했을 수도 있습니다
